title: Tim Blanks on the Autumn 2019 Season | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Tim Blanks on the Autumn 2019 Season | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: BoF's editor-at-large sits down with Imran Amed to discuss the commercial potential of bourgeois style, Fendi and Chanel's emotional farewell to Karl Lagerfeld, and the cultural impact of fashion's reflection on social issues.Sign up for BoF’s Daily Di
description:
BoF's editor-at-large sits down with Imran Amed to discuss the commercial potential of bourgeois style, Fendi and Chanel's emotional farewell to Karl Lagerfeld, and the cultural impact of fashion's reflection on social issues.

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
